steps.nodeStepDescription: This weapon has increased stability.

The bottom half of each magazine causes additional damage.

This weapon causes kinetic damage.

Kills with this weapon increase reload speed for a short time.

Kills with this weapon while critically wounded have a chance to start regenerating health.
